widgets_values:
(Panorama):
Scene: Gem returns, forest returns color, sunlight penetrates leaves.
Action: Little star claps with purr, bow is blown by wind, rain boots are covered with rainbow dew

nodes.title: 分镜4
widgets_values:
Scene (middle perspective):
In the grayish-purple swamp, there were groups of blue-emitting mushrooms floating around. The largest mushroom had five facial features growing from the top.
Character action: Little Star lies on the ground and talks to Mushroom. Gollum records the route provided by Mushroom with quill.
Styling details: Starlet's suspenders are muddy at the knees, Gollum's glasses slide to the tip of his nose.
Picture highlights: mushroom fluorescence and the role of clothing bright yellow, red form a cold contrast.

nodes.title: 分镜5
widgets_values:
Scene (dynamic close-up):
Thorny vines suddenly stretched out from the black fog and wrapped around Little Star's ankles. The ground cracked open.
Character Action: Starlet uses the scissors in the cloth bag to cut through the vines. Grumble holds the gemstone fragment to illuminate and disperse the black fog.
Crisis design: bow pulled askew by vines, shoulder strap on one side of suspenders slipped off, enhancing tension

nodes.title: 分镜7
widgets_values:
Picture Description: Grandpa Mu teaches Xiao Kui to bury the repaired glass heart into the shrine land, and the wind civet cat irrigates it with its tail light. Crystal-like seedlings instantly drilled out of the soil, and fireflies formed a light band to wrap around the seedlings.
Composition Tips:

Perspective: Looking down at the circular composition, Xiao Kui kneels in the center, and the crystal seedlings sprout from her palm to the four corners of the picture.
Fantasy details: seedling leaves translucent and internal flow of light spots, cracks in the ground ooze like dust stars. Color metaphor: The dark blue night sky and the silvery white of the crystal, the golden yellow of the firefly constitute a cold and warm balance, symbolizing the restart of the natural cycle.
采样组太杂了，我就吧第一组采样框选右键合并组，在节点的搭建过程中可以减少画面节点，避免杂乱

图像裁切按照分镜分辨率等比例裁剪，位置总共有九个区域，这个默认我的设置位置即可
分辨率以前面图片的分辨率为基准，可以设置等比例裁剪，比如1280x2304,2304÷3=768，那么宽高比刚好就是1280x768

我们以常规2:3比例，分辨率1024x1536为参照

放大系数	分辨率示例	适用场景	显存占用参考（RTX 4090）
1.25x	1280x1920	快速测试/手机端展示	10-12GB
1.5x	1536x2304	商业插画/印刷预备	14-16GB
2x	2048x3072	高清壁纸/影视级分镜	20-24GB（需分块渲染）
3x	3072x4608	巨幅海报/博物馆级输出	32GB+（需双卡协同）
经过上百次测试，这个比例是最稳定能生成三分屏的分辨率，常规默认为1024X1536,如果你希望生成的分镜更加高清，请采用1280X1920.其他比例的分辨率慎点！！！容易出现4分屏和5分屏。请不要随便调整我的参数，如果你要调整，图片裁剪比例同样需要调整。
如果你是小白级选手，建议不懂不要调！！！
这上面能够动的就是模型选择和提示词更换！！

更多干货可以订阅我的199元付费笔记，从小白到高级AI玩家！！
https://flowus.cn/guoguo52/share/b7104755-4655-4446-9e2f-fe86e80b32fc?code=JNS9DQ
【FlowUs 息流】蝈蝈的AI笔记干货

不定期公开课更新视频号【蝈蝈的人工智能】
商务咨询合作+微信：gphz52
小红书广告、短剧、微电影商务合作：AI造梦师蝈蝈（可以看案例）
我们的团队：矢量星球
常驻杭州，重庆也会根据项目出差！

如果你是本地部署，也可以把deepseek接入你的本地comfyUI，个人建议电脑配置16G显存起步。如果配置不足，建议在哩布哩布在线生图！！
你可以用deepseekz撰写故事分镜，复制粘贴，安装一个沉浸式翻译翻译为英文即可。如下
deepseek 官方网站 https://www.deepseek.com/
满血版https://www.wenxiaobai.com/chat/200006
 大家可以直接用大模型写故事脚本分镜复制进来翻译即可

本工作流消耗你66积分。

你也可以在线工具裁剪
https://www.67tool.com/images/split


分镜提示词逐行输出
按照顺序。

[MOVIE-SHOTS] On a picnic in autumn, [SCENE-1] we find<Leo>, a beautiful Chinese girl sitting on a picnic mat, holding a cake, [SCENE-2] transitions to her reading and drinking coffee, [SCENE-3] Finally, she holds a colorful bouquet of flowers, and under the sunshine, she is filled with joy and contentment
FLUX-宫崎骏/F1吉卜力动漫画风风格-_宫崎骏风格奇幻场景_V1.safetensors

[SCENE-7] : Coral Rebirth Description: Xiyin floats in the middle of the reconstructed Glass Palace City. The broken jellyfish skirt regrows into starlight gauze.Liu Xing noticed that the ancient priest's costume was reflected in her goggles. Composition prompt:
Perspective: Mirror Symmetry Composition: Dress Details in Reality and Reflection Gradually Blending Metaphor: Xiyin The star map of the new skirt is exactly the same as the dome pattern of the Human Planetarium, [SCENE-8] :[Two-way Choice] Description: Two doors appear on the back of the Azure Ocean Armor: the Pearl Gate leads to the human world, and the Aquamarine Gate leads to the Eternal Ocean.Liuxing's shadow split into two different age groups of their own composition hint:
Angle of view: door frame forms cross dividing line, juvenile body is at intersection light shadow: pearl door projects sunlight ripple, gem door refracts deep sea aurora, [SCENE-9] :[Tide Cycle] Description: Adult Liuxing takes students diving as an oceanographer and finds Xiyin smiling among newborn corals.A cleaning robot in the form of a mini mechanical octopus grows on the shell of the sea. Composition hint:
Perspective: water boundary composition, top half realistic research ship, bottom half fantastic underwater time clue: Xiyin skirt pattern already contains a combination of modern binary code and ancient cuneiform script

The design is achieved through:

Character symbology: Visual elements such as the goggles of <Liuxing>, the tentacle length of <Xiyin>, and the coral species on the blue sea shell continue to evolve. Color logic: The confrontation between mechanical cold gray/oil black and biological fluorescence color runs through the whole film, and finally the fusion is achieved in the mirror 9. Water performance: Ghibli translucent layered painting is always retained, and important turning points are suggested by changes in bubble morphology.(For example, the round bubble of mirror 1 → the cubic intelligent bubble of mirror 9) Environmental metaphor: oil heart/sound weapon/cleaning robot form a complete causal chain, [MOVIE-SHOTS] Generate the following three movie split shots in 3-split format.Star Character setting: Human teenager "Liuxing"(12 years old, wearing shell goggles) and sea elf "Xiyin"(translucent jellyfish skirt girl, hair like luminous tentacles) Supporting role: Millennium giant turtle "Cangming"(shell grows coral reef, eyes are two night pearls) Villain: mechanical octopus "Dark Vortex"(rusty metal and rotten algae intertwined, core oil condensation black heart)

Setting time: Full moon night where modern and ancient enchantments meet Location: "Glass Palace City" deep in the Pacific Ocean Trench, containing key elements of ancient marine civilization relics: fluorescent coral spiral tower, shipwreck cemetery, bubble library, submarine crater

Style setting: Ghibli signature watercolor gradient, main color cobalt blue/silver white/pearl gray, with flow light effect details: water flow dynamics layered with translucent brushes, mechanical structure retains pencil sketch texture, bioluminescent points use Gaussian blur processing

[MOVIE-SHOTS] On a picnic in autumn, [SCENE-1] we find<Leo>, a beautiful Chinese girl sitting on a picnic mat, holding a cake, [SCENE-2] transitions to her reading and drinking coffee, [SCENE-3] Finally, she holds a colorful bouquet of flowers, and under the sunshine, she is filled with joy and contentment

阿里开发的模型in-context lora 是非常适合做短视频镜头分镜的，基本上可以解决人物，服装、场景的上下文一致性。

官方论文网站：https://ali-vilab.github.io/In-Context-LoRA-Page/
电影故事版技巧：
用“<”和“>”括起来的占位符角色名称在图像中唯一地引用该角色的身份，确保在整个故事板中角色形象的一致性。
你可以写一个场景，他们每个人只用一段话。严格遵循这个格式，会保持分镜头的一致性
【SCENE-1】
显示<name>做某事
【场景-2】
切换到<名字>做其他事情，并展示这个人的面部细节,
【场景-3】 描述<名字>看着美丽的事物，展示更多环境的细节。

Scene: Through the thorn bushes, encounter the "fog maze tree".
Action: Starlet opens the way with scissors in a cloth bag, Gollum draws marks on the bark with a quill.
Consistency: The cloth always slung, the rain boots stained with dirt, the bow slightly askew (realistic sense of adventure)

nodes.title: 分镜8
widgets_values:
Description: To protect Little Sunflower, the Wind Civet is eroded by the remaining black fog, curled up under the eaves of the shrine and gradually fossilized. Xiao Kui cried and played the melody with dandelion stems, and the notes materialized into green vines wrapped around the cat.
Composition Tips:

Angle of view: oblique composition strengthens the sense of uneasiness, petrified cat (gray) occupies the lower left corner, and Xiao Kui's tears (close-up water drops reflect cat shadow) form visual echo at the upper right.
Dynamic Design: Vines spiral out of the flute holes, forming a counterbalance to the serrated lines of the Black Fog. Emotional Focus: The final twitch of the cat's ears retains the soft fur texture, creating a cruel contrast with the fossilized body.

nodes.title: 分镜9
widgets_values:
Description: A few years later, the little sunflower, which has grown into a girl, stands under the blooming giant cherry tree, and the face of a wind viper appears on the tree trunk. Grandpa Wood transformed into cherry blossoms and merged into the canopy, and Shadow Marsh was reborn as a clear stream surrounding the shrine.
Composition Tips:

Angle of view: wide-angle lens, giant cherry occupies 2/3 space of the picture, small sunflower back is tiny but firm, stream reflection cherry petals form light river.
Details echo: cat face tree pattern retains tail glow feature, shrine door frame remains when pushing the door crack (now covered by moss). Temporal metaphor: memory fragments flash in falling petals (dandelion in mirror 1/rainbow in mirror 5), and finally the petals turn into the outline of a wind civet and dissipate into the sky.

[SCENE-4] :[Bubble Memory] Description: In the bubble library on the back of the sea,<Xiyin> touches the crystal ball to display the ancient tsunami--how the human warship shattered the protective shield of the glazed palace with sound waves Composition prompt:
View angle: curved fisheye lens, war image in crystal ball split montage with quick flashbacks Detail: modern goggles and ancient crystal ball light refraction produces double reflections, [SCENE-5] :[Volcano Sacrifice] Description: <Liuxing> jumped into the crater with the purification crystal. Xiyin used all her tentacles to weave a protective net.The oil heart of the dark vortex expands in the magma, and the mechanical tentacles begin to melt.
Perspective: vertical dive perspective, crystal chromatic light penetrates black oil film to form rainbow cracks Dynamic: molten metal takes on liquid metal texture, preserving the dissolution process of parts such as gears, [SCENE-6] :[Whale Song Restart] Description: The purified Cangming emits an ancient whale song, and the sound wave shatters the oil heart.The bronze chimes in the wreck automatically sounded, and the composition of the base that formed the shield prompted:
Angle of view: Panoramic surround lens, sound wave visualization into spiral sound pattern diffusion egg: a sunken ship deck emerges Miyazaki Hayao "Bo Niu on the Cliff" same iron bucket, Character setting: Human teenager "Liuxing"(12 years old, wearing shell goggles) and sea elf "Xiyin"(translucent jellyfish skirt girl, hair like luminous tentacles) Supporting role: Millennium giant turtle "Cangming"(shell grows coral reef, eyes are two night pearls) Villain: mechanical octopus "Dark Vortex"(rusty metal and rotten algae intertwined, core oil condensation black heart)

Setting time: Full moon night where modern and ancient enchantments meet Location: "Glass Palace City" deep in the Pacific Ocean Trench, containing key elements of ancient marine civilization relics: fluorescent coral spiral tower, shipwreck cemetery, bubble library, submarine crater

Style setting: Ghibli signature watercolor gradient, main color cobalt blue/silver white/pearl gray, with flow light effect details: water flow dynamics layered with translucent brushes, mechanical structure retains pencil sketch texture, bioluminescent points use Gaussian blur processing [MOVIE-SHOTS] Generate the following three movie split shots in 3-split format.Star

nodes.title: 分镜6
widgets_values:
(looking up + following the light):
A group of translucent butterflies flew out from the depths of the cave. There were gemstone patterns on their wings.
Character action: Star reaches out to touch the leading butterfly, grunts up the rock to observe the wing pattern.
Modeling interaction: butterfly light spot projected on the face of the star, rain boots reflect the flowing light shadow

Picture: The magic forest in the morning is shrouded in gray fog, and a faint glimmer can be seen in the distance.
Character action: Starlet crouches at the entrance of the forest, picks up a glowing piece of rubble, and grunts his head out of the bushes.
Dress consistency: Starlet's red bow and yellow rain boots stand out in the gray, Gollum's scarf fluttering in the wind.

[MOVIE-SHOTS] Generate the following three movie split shots in 3-split format.Star Character setting: Human teenager "Liuxing"(12 years old, wearing shell goggles) and sea elf "Xiyin"(translucent jellyfish skirt girl, hair like luminous tentacles) Supporting role: Millennium giant turtle "Cangming"(shell grows coral reef, eyes are two night pearls) Villain: mechanical octopus "Dark Vortex"(rusty metal and rotten algae intertwined, core oil condensation black heart)

Setting time: Full moon night where modern and ancient enchantments meet Location: "Glass Palace City" deep in the Pacific Ocean Trench, containing key elements of ancient marine civilization relics: fluorescent coral spiral tower, shipwreck cemetery, bubble library, submarine crater

Style setting: Ghibli signature watercolor gradient, main color cobalt blue/silver white/pearl gray, with flow light effect details: water flow dynamics layered with translucent brushes, mechanical structure retains pencil sketch texture, bioluminescent points use Gaussian blur processing [SCENE-1] :[Moonlight Sunken Ship] Description: <Liuxing> Dive into the wreckage of the sunken ship, and the goggles reflect the blue light of Xiyin.Rusty ship anchor suddenly vibrates, startles silverfish group to form ancient text pattern composition prompt:
Angle of view: 45 degrees side down shot, sunken ship frame forms natural frame, silverfish group text is arranged in an arc at the upper right Dynamic: oxygen bubbles of Liuxing rise slowly, forming diagonal interaction with the fluttering direction of Xiyin tentacles [SCENE-2] :[Fairy First Appearance] Description: <Xiyin> awakens from the pearl shell. The tentacles of the jellyfish skirt wrap around <Liuxing>'s wrist to heal the cut.The coral shells in the background pulsate with a faint light. Composition hint:
Angle of view: Close-up of the overlap of the palms of the two people, the healing effect is radially diffused Color: The blood seeping from the wound is represented by dark red thin lines, forming a cold and warm contrast with the ice-blue light of Xiyin [SCENE-3] :[Mechanical Nightmare] Description: The metal tentacles of Dark Vortex pierce the coral reef and spray black oil.Liu Xing summoned a group of luminous krill to form a shield with a conch horn. Xi Yin's long hair flashed like an electric net. Composition prompt:
Angle of view: Wide angle upshot highlights the pressure of mechanical octopus, krill shield presents hexagonal honeycomb structure Dynamic: sticky trailing strokes when oil falls, forming rhythm difference with krill rapid flashing

Angle of view: 45 degrees side down shot, sunken ship frame forms natural frame, silverfish group text is arranged in an arc at the upper right Dynamic: oxygen bubbles of Liuxing rise slowly, forming diagonal interaction with the fluttering direction of Xiyin tentacles

Character symbology: Visual elements such as the goggles of <Liuxing>, the tentacle length of <Xiyin>, and the coral species on the blue sea shell continue to evolve. Color logic: The confrontation between mechanical cold gray/oil black and biological fluorescence color runs through the whole film, and finally the fusion is achieved in the mirror 9. Water performance: Ghibli translucent layered painting is always retained, and important turning points are suggested by changes in bubble morphology.(For example, the round bubble of mirror 1 → the cubic intelligent bubble of mirror 9) Environmental metaphor: oil heart/sound weapon/cleaning robot form a complete causal chain

nodes.title: 故事设定
widgets_values:
角色设定
主角：纯真勇敢的少女“小葵”（10岁）与她的奇幻生物伙伴“风灵猫”（一只会飞的小猫，尾巴能发光）。
配角：森林中的古老树灵“木爷爷”（外形如缠绕藤蔓的巨树，眼睛是萤火虫巢穴）。
反派：因人类破坏而黑化的自然精灵“影沼”（半透明雾气状，核心是一颗破碎的玻璃心）。

场景设定
时间：昭和时代末期，夏日的黄昏与雨季交替。
地点：日本乡村边缘的魔法森林，隐藏着被遗忘的“风之湖”和一座废弃的木质神社。
关键元素：蒲公英田、萤火虫群、雨后的彩虹桥、藤蔓缠绕的石阶。

画风设定
风格：宫崎骏标志性手绘水彩，柔和色调（青绿、暖黄、淡紫）与细腻光影。
细节：自然元素（树叶脉络、雨滴反光）与奇幻生物（透明质感、发光特效）结合，画面充满动态线条与朦胧雾气。

分镜1：【蒲公英田的相遇】
画面描述：小葵在金色蒲公英田中奔跑，风灵猫追逐飘散的种子。远处木爷爷的藤蔓悄悄从地面隆起，萤火虫在其树冠间闪烁。
构图提示：

视角：低角度仰拍，蒲公英占前景，小葵与猫居中，木爷爷的轮廓隐约出现在背景。
色彩：暖黄色调为主，蒲公英种子边缘泛白光，木爷爷的藤蔓用深绿与赭石色交织。 参考构图：黄金分割点构图，蒲公英田的线条引导视线至小葵 

分镜2：【雨夜的神秘指引】
画面描述：暴雨夜，小葵举着荷叶伞，风灵猫尾巴的光照亮泥泞小径。影沼的雾气在树林间流动，地面浮现发光的古老符文。
构图提示：
视角：俯视角度，伞顶占画面1/3，符文呈螺旋状向森林深处延伸。
光影：猫尾的暖光与影沼的冷蓝雾气形成对比，雨滴用白色短线条表现 

分镜3：【神社的封印之门】
画面描述：小葵推开神社腐朽的木门，门缝中溢出七彩光芒。风灵猫炸毛警惕，影沼的雾气凝聚成巨手试图阻拦。
构图提示：
视角：对称构图，门框为画面前景，门内光芒形成放射状线条。
细节：门上的裂痕用细密交叉线表现，影沼的手部透明质感需叠加半透明灰蓝色图层 

分镜4：【风之湖的觉醒】
画面描述：小葵站在湖心石台上，风灵猫环绕她飞行，尾巴光芒唤醒湖底的沉睡树根。木爷爷的藤蔓从水中升起，与影沼对峙。
构图提示：
视角：中心点构图，小葵位于画面中心，湖面波纹呈同心圆扩散。
动态：树根从水下伸出的瞬间，水花用飞溅的弧线表现，影沼的雾气扭曲如漩涡 

分镜5：【彩虹桥的救赎】
画面描述：小葵将破碎的玻璃心捧向雨后彩虹，风灵猫用尾巴光芒修复裂痕。影沼褪去黑雾，化为纯净水珠落入湖中。
构图提示：

视角：仰角，彩虹桥呈弧形跨越画面，小葵的手部特写与彩虹焦点重合。
色彩：高饱和度彩虹渐变，玻璃心修复时迸发星尘效果 

分镜6：【归途的约定】
画面描述：夕阳下，小葵与风灵猫走在回家的小路上，木爷爷的萤火虫群为她们引路。远处神社焕发微光，森林恢复生机。
构图提示：

视角：远景平视，小路呈S型延伸至画面尽头，萤火虫光点疏密有致。
氛围：暖橙色晚霞与深蓝紫色阴影交织，风灵猫的尾巴光斑逐渐减弱

分镜7：【月夜下的种子仪式】
画面描述：木爷爷教小葵将修复的玻璃心埋入神社土地，风灵猫用尾巴光芒浇灌。泥土中瞬间钻出水晶般的幼苗，萤火虫群组成光带缠绕树苗生长。
构图提示：

视角：俯视圆形构图，小葵跪坐中央，水晶幼苗从她手心向画面四角迸发枝条。
奇幻细节：幼苗叶片半透明且内部有流动光点，土地裂痕中渗出星砂般的微尘。 色彩隐喻：深蓝夜空与水晶的银白、萤火虫的金黄构成冷暧平衡，象征自然循环的重启。
分镜8：【风灵猫的离别试炼】
画面描述：风灵猫为保护小葵被残留的黑雾侵蚀，蜷缩在神社屋檐下逐渐石化。小葵哭着用蒲公英茎秆吹奏旋律，音符具象化成绿色藤蔓包裹猫身。
构图提示：

视角：倾斜构图强化不安感，石化猫（灰白色）占据左下角，小葵的眼泪（特写水滴倒映猫影）在右上方形成视觉呼应。
动态设计：藤蔓从笛孔螺旋生长，与黑雾的锯齿状线条形成对抗态势。 情感焦点：猫耳最后颤动的瞬间保留柔软毛发质感，与石化的身体产生残酷对比。
分镜9：【千年樱的永恒守护】
画面描述：数年后，长大成少女的小葵站在盛放的巨樱下，树干浮现风灵猫的面孔。木爷爷化为樱花融入树冠，影沼重生为清澈溪流环绕神社。
构图提示：

视角：广角镜头，巨樱占画面2/3空间，小葵背影微小却坚定，溪流反射樱花瓣形成光河。
细节呼应：猫脸树纹保留尾巴发光特征，神社门框残留当年推门时的裂痕（现被青苔覆盖）。 时间隐喻：飘落的花瓣中闪现回忆片段（分镜1的蒲公英/分镜5的彩虹），最终花瓣化作风灵猫轮廓消散于天际。
续写分镜核心设计
